description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/2198373532 at Mon Mar 14 08:01:23 UTC 2022

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: cloud-sql Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: cloud-sql Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.
panels.title: Saturation

panels.title: cloudsql_transactions SLI Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="cloudsql_transactions",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_5m{component="cloudsql_transactions",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="cloudsql_transactions",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="cloudsql_transactions",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="cloudsql_transactions",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_30m{component="cloudsql_transactions",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="cloudsql_transactions",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_6h{component="cloudsql_transactions",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="cloud-sql"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="cloudsql_transactions",monitor="global",type="cloud-sql"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: cloudsql_transactions SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

This SLI represents SQL transactions in Cloud SQL databases.



### Observability Tools

* [Stackdriver Logs: Cloud SQL](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;query=resource%2Etype%3D%22cloudsql%5Fdatabase%22;timeRange=PT30M?project=gitlab-production)
panels.title: Details

panels.description:
CloudSQL CPU utilization.

See https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/metrics_gcp#gcp-cloudsql for
more details
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, database_id) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      avg_over_time(stackdriver_cloudsql_database_cloudsql_googleapis_com_database_cpu_utilization{env="$environment",environment="$environment"}[5m])
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: cloudsql_cpu component saturation: CloudSQL CPU Utilization

panels.description:
CloudSQL Disk utilization.

See https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/metrics_gcp#gcp-cloudsql for
more details
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, database_id) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      avg_over_time(stackdriver_cloudsql_database_cloudsql_googleapis_com_database_disk_utilization{env="$environment",environment="$environment"}[5m])
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: cloudsql_disk component saturation: CloudSQL Disk Utilization

panels.description:
CloudSQL Memory utilization.

See https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/metrics_gcp#gcp-cloudsql for
more details
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, database_id) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      avg_over_time(stackdriver_cloudsql_database_cloudsql_googleapis_com_database_memory_utilization{env="$environment",environment="$environment"}[5m])
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)
